acrobatic assist (ex).benefits: you can expend an attack of opportunity to perform an aid another action to assist an adjacent ally's acrobatics check, so long as he makes the check as part of movement that passes through your space or an adjacent space. Additionally, whenever you use the aid another action to assist an ally in making an acrobatics check and you succeed, your ally gains a +1 dodge bonus to ac against attacks of opportunity caused when he moves out of or within a threatened area, until the end of his turn.

accurate poisoner (ex).benefits: when you hit an opponent with a poisoned weapon and would deal sneak attack damage, you can forgo the sneak attack damage and increase the poison's duration by 2 (for example, large scorpion venom lasts for 8 rounds instead of 6 rounds, and drow poison lasts for 4 minutes instead of 2 minutes).

ambuscading grapple (ex).benefits: when you succeed at a combat maneuver check to grapple an unaware opponent, you can immediately deal sneak attack damage to the target. This counts as having hit with a sneak attack for the purpose of other abilities and talents.

armor piercer* (ex).benefits: when you hit with an attack that deals sneak attack damage, you can forgo one or more sneak attack dice to reduce the target's natural armor bonus by that amount (minimum natural armor bonus of +0) until the end of your next turn. A creature cannot be affected by this ability again for 1 minute.

assault leader.benefits: when you miss, allow a flanking ally to make a single melee attack.

bardic pretender (ex).benefits: you qualify as having the inspire competence bardic performance class feature for the purpose of meeting prestige class requirements, although this talent doesn't grant the bardic performance ability.

befuddling strike*.benefits: opponents damaged by your sneak attack miss you more often.

black market connections.benefits: you have better access to magic items.

bleeding attack*.benefits: cause opponents damaged by your sneak attack to bleed.

bomber.benefits: you can make a number of bombs per day equal to your int modifier (minimum 1) which act as alchemist's bombs, except deal damage equal to the damage dealt by your sneak attack.

bomber's discovery (su).benefits: you gain an alchemist's discovery that modifies a bomb.

camouflage.benefits: gain a bonus to stealth checks in certain terrains.

canny observer.benefits: gain a +4 bonus to perception checks.

card sharp (su).benefits: gain deadly dealer as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet the prerequisites.

careful stab (ex).benefits: when a rogue with this talent reduces a creature to fewer than 0 hp with precision damage, she can choose to leave that creature at -1 hp and stable.

castling (ex).benefits: you treat soft cover granted by creatures of your size or larger as though it were cover instead.

charmer.benefits: roll two dice when using diplomacy and take the better result.

cloying shades (su).prerequisites: dimension door as a spell or spell-like ability (including from the abundant step or shadow jump class features)
cloying shades (su).benefits: all creatures adjacent to you when you dimension door or abundant step or shadow jump at the start and end of your teleportation are entangled by grasping shadows.

coax information.benefits: substitute bluff or diplomacy for intimidate.

combat swipe.benefits: gain improved steal as a bonus feat.

convincing lie.benefits: those who believe your lies use your bluff skill when repeating the lies.

cunning trigger.benefits: set off one of your traps within 30 ft as a swift action.

dampen presence.benefits: gain dampen presence as a bonus feat.

deft palm.benefits: use sleight of hand to conceal a weapon in plain sight.

demand attention (ex).benefits: the first time each round that you deal sneak attack damage to an opponent, you can forgo sneak attack damage to distract the creature. The target must succeed at a will save (dc = 10 + the number of sneak attack dice sacrificed + your charisma modifier) or become distracted until the start of your next turn.

demon lantern (sp).benefits: 1/day when casting dancing lights, conjure a single demon's lantern instead of the usual four lights.

developed poison immunity (ex).benefits: you automatically succeed all fortitude saves against a chosen animal or plant poison that you have been poisoned with and survived.

disease use.benefits: you can apply filth to your weapon as if it were a poison, infecting enemies with filth fever.

distracting attack*.benefits: cause an enemy hit by your sneak attack to become flat-footed.

eerie disappearance (ex).benefits: as a full-round action, the rogue can move up to her speed. If she successfully reaches a location that offers her cover or concealment, any creature observing her must attempt a perception check opposed by the rogue's stealth check. On a failed check, the observer loses track of the rogue and fails to note where she moved to. The rogue does not take a penalty on this stealth check for moving up to her speed.

eldritch conduit (su).benefits: you can use two potions, two wands, or two scrolls as a full-round action (see text for additional requirements and rules).

emboldening strike* (ex).benefits: when you hit a creature with a melee attack and deal sneak attack damage, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saving throws for every 2 sneak attack dice rolled (minimum +1) for 1 round.

esoteric scholar.benefits: make a knowledge check even when untrained.

expert cypher (ex).prerequisites: attempt a linguistics check to decipher a page of text as a full-round action instead of 1 minute, also when you attempt a use magic device check to cast a spell from a scroll, you are treated as though you have the minimum score in the appropriate ability score to cast that spell, and you can choose to add your int modifier to use magic device skill checks instead of your cha modifier.

expert leaper.benefits: make longer jumps and fall more gracefully.

extinguishing strike* (ex).benefits: when you hit a creature with a melee attack that deals sneak attack damage, any non-magical light sources worn or carried by the creature are extinguished.

extra earthcraft.benefits: you gain 2 additional earthcraft points each day.

face in the crowd.benefits: you can blend into crowds more easily than most.

false attacker (ex).benefits: whenever the rogue strikes a foe from hiding, she can attempt a bluff check as an immediate action (opposed by the target's sense motive or perception check, whichever has a higher bonus) before rolling damage to convince the foe that another creature was the attacker.

false friend.benefits: gain a bonus on bluff checks against those you've never met.

fast fingers.benefits: roll two dice when using sleight of hand and take the better result.

fast getaway.benefits: use a withdraw action after making a successful sneak attack or sleight of hand check.

fast picks.benefits: pick a lock as a standard action.

fast stealth.benefits: move at full speed while using stealth.

favored terrain (ex).benefits: gain one terrain from ranger's favored terrain list as a favored terrain, as the ranger class feature.

feint from shadows (ex).benefits: you can feint against a foe within 30 feet that you have concealment (but not full concealment) from, using a ranged weapon and cause the opponent to lose his dexterity modifier against your next melee or ranged attack.

finesse rogue.benefits: gain weapon finesse as a bonus feat.

focusing attack* (ex).benefits: choose confused, shaken, or sickened when you gain this talent. When you have the selected condition and hit a creature with a melee attack that deals sneak attack damage, you no longer have that condition.

fortified position (ex).benefits: when you gain a bonus on reflex saves due to cover, you gain an equal bonus on fortitude saves.

getaway artist.benefits: add fly, handle animal, and ride to your list of class skills.

gloom magic (sp).benefits: you gain the ability to cast darkness twice per day as a spell-like ability, and it does not impair your vision.

got your back (ex).benefits: once per round as an immediate action, you may expend an attack of opportunity to attempt an aid another check to improve an ally's attack. You and your ally must both be flanking the same opponent. This counts as an attack of opportunity.

greater gloom magic (sp).benefits: you gain the ability to cast deeper darkness once each day as a spell-like ability, and it does not impair your vision.

green tongue (ex).benefits: gain aklo, aquan, auran, giant, ignan, sylvan, or terran as a bonus language and can attempt a dc 15 linguistics check to communicate with magical beasts and monstrous humanoids with which you do not share a common language.

grig jig (su).benefits: 1/day target one humanoid within 30 and attempt a perform (dance) check as a full-round action that does not provoke an attack of opportunity. If target fails will save, it begins to dance uncontrollably.

grit.benefits: gain amateur gunslinger and one grit feat.

hairpin trick (ex).benefits: the rogue is skilled at making do with anything she can find. She takes no penalty on disable device checks for using improvised tools, and can attempt such checks without any tools at a -4 penalty. She treats all non-improvised thieves' tools as masterwork and doubles the bonus she gets from masterwork thieves' tools from +2 to +4.

hard to fool.benefits: roll two dice when making a sense motive check and take the better result.

heads up (ex).benefits: when you make a perception check, as an immediate or swift action you can allow one adjacent ally to act as if they had also made a perception check with the same result.

honeyed words.benefits: roll two dice when making a bluff check and take the better result.

innocent facade (sp).benefits: once per day, you can use innocence as a spell-like ability, using your rogue level as the spell's caster level.

iron guts.benefits: gain a bonus on saves against becoming nauseated or sickened.

just a face in the crowd (su).benefits: you gain a bonus equal to half your class level on disguise and perception checks when 10 or more creatures of your size are within 30 feet of you.

ki pool.benefits: gain a ki pool with 1 ki point.

leaf singer (su).benefits: you can use leaf singer as a bardic performance.

lightfoot (ex).benefits: you leave no trail and cannot be tracked in natural surroundings.

lightning rod.benefits: gain a bonus on reflex saves against electricity spells and effects.

linger (ex).benefits: after you make a successful sneak attack, you can expend one use of an inhaled poison, ingested poison, or injury poison as an immediate action to apply the poison to the weapon you used for the sneak attack.

loose tongue.benefits: gain a bonus on diplomacy and intimidate checks against targets with which you share no common language.

low blow (ex).benefits: whenever you hit with an attack that deals sneak attack damage, you can sacrifice a number of sneak attack dice to cause the opponent to be sickened for 1 round.

magic item skill.benefits: use magic items as if you were the correct class.

manipulative.benefits: roll two dice when making a diplomacy check and take the better result.

many talents.benefits: choose one talent for which you meet the prerequisites. You gain the benefits of that talent without having to select it as a normal talent.

mastermind.benefits: whenever you make a knowledge check and you do not have the skill ranks to make the check untrained, you may add your rogue level to the check as if you were trained in the skill. For the purpose of this check, you may treat the knowledge skill as if it was a class skill.

measure enemy (ex).benefits: as a move action, you can estimate a creature's size and measure a creature's strength and fighting abilities. On your next turn, you can roll twice for bluff, disguise, intimidate, and sense motive checks against the target. The target's sense motive roll will cancel the measure enemy effect for that specific roll (meaning that in case of failure, the target does not get the better result of two rolls).

mining scion.benefits: you can cast stone shape three times per day as a spell-like ability. You also gain the stonecunning dwarf trait.

minor trick (sp).benefits: you can cast mage hand and prestidigitation three times per day as a spell-like ability.

nimble climber (ex).benefits: when climbing, your reduced speed and increased armor check penalties (from armor, shields, and encumbrance) are halved.

obscuring blow* (ex).benefits: once per day, you can choose to not deal sneak attack damage to instead attempt to cloud an opponents vision.

occult dungeoneer (su).benefits: you can use spell-trigger and spell-completion items as if the following spells were on a spell list to which you have access: detect secret doors, detect traps, knock, locate object, and obscure object. If the spell-trigger device allows a wielder to apply his own caster level (such as with a staff), you may use your class level as your caster level. You may also use knock as a supernatural ability once per day, using your rogue level as your caster level.

occult mysticism (ex).benefits: the rogue has been trained in a minor occult technique. The rogue gains psychic sensitivity as a bonus feat.

offensive defense*.benefits: gain a dodge bonus to ac against an opponent hit by your sneak attack

one of those faces (sp).benefits: you can use disguise self as a spell-like ability for up to 10 minutes per character level each day.

papercraft tools (ex).benefits: destroy a harrow card to attempt a disable device check as if you have a set of thieves tools

peerless maneuver.benefits: roll two dice when making an acrobatics check and take the better result

philologist.benefits: may reroll a failed linguistics check to decipher writing.

pierce the darkness (ex).benefits: when you hit a creature with a melee weapon that deals sneak attack damage, a number of points of the damage dealt equal to the number of sneak attack dice rolled is cold damage. The remainder of the sneak attack damage and the normal weapon damage are unaffected.

poison use (ex).benefits: you are trained in the use of poison, and cant accidentally poison yourself when applying poison to a weapon.

positioning attack.benefits: when you hit, reposition yourself around the target

powerful sneak*.benefits: treat all 1s on sneak attack damage dice as 2s

quick disable.benefits: disable a trap in half the normal amount of time

quick disguise.benefits: reduce the amount of time needed to create a disguise

quick scrounge.benefits: you can search a creature or area more quickly than most

quick trapsmith.benefits: set a trap as a full-round action

rapid boost (ex).benefits: 1/day, roll two dice while attempting a sleight of hand check and take the better result

rapid perception (su).benefits: you can attempt a perception check to intentionally search for a specific item or creature as a swift action instead of a move action. If searching for an invisible creature, the creatures bonus on its stealth check from its invisibility is halved.

resiliency.benefits: gain temporary hit points to avoid dying

rogue crawl.benefits: move at half speed while prone

rope master.benefits: move at normal speed when using a rope while climbing

sacred sneak attack.benefits: sneak attack damage is considered good-aligned for the purpose of overcoming dr vs. Undead or evil outsiders, normal weapon damage is unaffected for this attack.

sacrifice self.benefits: provide an adjacent ally the benefits of evasion instead of yourself, essentially halving the damage that ally would normally take. If you also have improved evasion, you can attempt a secondary save against the allys damage. If successful, neither takes any damage.

scavenger.benefits: you can quickly hide objects from others

scrying familiarity (ex).benefits: you can roll twice and take the better result on saving throws against divination (scrying) spells and effects, on perception checks to notice scrying sensors, and on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance when you use a scrying spell or effect.

scry slip (su).benefits: this talent wards you and any objects you are holding or carrying vs. Scrying effects. Whenever you are targeted by a scrying effect that allows a will save, the caster must succeed at a cl check (dc = 15 + the rogues class level).

set-up (ex).benefits: when you successfully hit a target with a sneak attack in melee, you can choose to forgo your additional sneak attack damage to make the target more vulnerable to one of your allies adjacent to it. The first melee attack that ally makes against the target before the beginning of your next turn treats the target as flanked, even if your ally is not flanking the target. This has no effect on creatures you could not flank with that ally, even if the ally was properly positioned.

shadows chill* (su).benefits: when you hit a creature with a melee weapon that deals sneak attack damage, a number of points of the damage dealt equal to the number of sneak attack dice rolled is cold damage. The remainder of the sneak attack damage and the normal weapon damage are unaffected.

shadow duplicate (sp).benefits: once per day as an immediate action when you are hit in combat, you can create a shadow duplicate of yourself.

shove aside (ex).benefits: when you and an adjacent ally are both in the area of an attack that requires a saving throw, you can take a 4 penalty on your saving throw to grant your ally a +4 bonus on his saving throw. You lose the evasion ability against this attack. If you have improved evasion, it is reduced to evasion for this attack instead.

signature poison (ex).benefits: you choose one poison as your signature poison and when you use the chosen poison, the poisons saving throw dc increases by +2.

silencing strike* (su).benefits: when a creature is damaged by the rogues sneak attack, the rogue magically renders the creature mute for 1 round unless it succeeds at a will save (dc = 10 + half the rogues level + the rogues charisma modifier). Silencing strike can be used a number of times per day equal to half the rogues level.

slow reactions*.benefits: opponents damaged by your sneak attack may not make attacks of opportunity

snap shot.benefits: gain initiative 20 for a surprise round

sneak training (ex).benefits: you count as having the sneak attack class feature of a rogue of her level for the purpose of meeting prestige class requirements.

sneaky maneuver*.benefits: anytime you hit an opponent with a melee sneak attack you may take an attack penalty and attempt a dirty trick, disarm, steal, sunder, or trip combat maneuver instead of dealing sneak attack damage.

snipers eye.benefits: gain sneak attack on ranged attacks

spell storing (su).benefits: you can store a spell of up to 2nd level within yourself.

stand up.benefits: stand up from a prone position as a free action

steal the story.benefits: destroy someones reputation with his/her listeners.

stem the flow.benefits: when making a successful sneak attack against a creature with the ability to channel energy, the rogue may forgo 3d6 points of sneak attack damage to instead prevent the target from channeling energy for a number of rounds equal to half her rogue level.

strong impression.benefits: gain intimidating prowess as a bonus feat

strong stroke.benefits: rolls twice when making swim checks and take the better result

superior sniper.benefits: gain expert sniper as a bonus feat or any feat that lists expert sniper as a prerequisite, as long as you meet the feats prerequisites.

suppress poison (ex).benefits: you can stave off the effects of a poison.

surprise attack.benefits: during the surprise round opponents are considered flat-footed to the rogue

survivalist.benefits: add heal and survival as class skills

swift poison.benefits: apply poison to a weapon as a move action

swift tracker (ex).benefits: move at normal speed without penalty while following tracks and penalty for moving at 2x normal speed reduced to -10.

the whole time (su).benefits: you can use spell-trigger and spell-completion items as if the following spells were on a spell list to which he has access: greater invisibility, invisibility, and vanish (see description for additional effects).

toxic regurgitation (ex).benefits: you can drink a noninhaled poison and suspend its effects for later use as an attack.

trap spotter.benefits: receive a perception check whenever you come within 10 feet of a trap

umbral gear (su).benefits: as a standard action while in an area of dim light or darkness, you can coalesce wisps of shadow into a quasi-real, functional item.

unbalancing trick (ex).benefits: you gain improved trip as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. At 6th level, you are treated as if you meet all the prerequisites of greater trip (although you must take the feat as normal to gain its benefits).

underhanded*.benefits: deal max damage with a sneak attack using a concealed weapon during the surprise round

underhanded trick.benefits: you gain improved dirty trick as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet the prerequisites.

wall scramble.benefits: roll twice when making climb checks and take the better result

weapon training.benefits: gain weapon focus as a bonus feat

wild magic (sp).benefits: gain the ability to cast a 0-level spell from the druid spell list 3x/day as a spell-like ability.

without a trace (ex).benefits: when you successfully use evasion or improved evasion to avoid taking damage, you can attempt to hide as an immediate action.

abduction artist.benefits: do ambush damage on a successful grapple

acrobatic charge.benefits: make an acrobatics check to move through a threatened area or an opponent's square as part of a charge

advanced trap training.prerequisites: learn ranger trap feat or ranger trap class feature
advanced trap training.benefits: learn how to create one ranger trap

aerial acrobatics.benefits: gain a climb speed while using a rope to climb

armor mastery.benefits: decrease the armor check penalty of your armor by 1

artful guile.benefits: spend guile points to reduce guile abilities to free actions

artistic talent.benefits: select one spell from the 0-level bard spell list to use three times per day as a spell-like ability

calculated hit.benefits: spend one guile point and make a single attack. Roll the attack twice and take the better result

combat escapist.benefits: escape grapples or pins as a move action

dirty strike.benefits: perform a dirty trick combat maneuver as a free action when dealing sneak attack damage to an enemy

distracted shot.benefits: spend a guile point as a swift action to make that enemy flat-footed

hidden flight.benefits: run or charge while using stealth

honest lies.benefits: make a bluff check to avoid lie detection effects

lethal acrobatics.benefits: use acrobatics to make an opponent flat-footed

magic adept.benefits: reroll a use magic device check once per day

major alchemy.benefits: choose a 1st-level formula from the alchemist formulae list to use

major artistic talent.benefits: select one spell from the 1st level bard spell list to use twice per day as a spell-like ability

maneuver mastery.benefits: use rogue level in place of her base attack bonus for one combat maneuver (selected with this talent)

melee archer.benefits: flank enemies 10 feet away while using a ranged weapon

minor alchemy.benefits: choose one 1st-level formula from the alchemist formulae to memorize

sprint.benefits: spend one guile point as a swift action to increase base speed by 20 ft for one round

superior senses.benefits: gain a +10 to perception rolls to locate creatures who benefit from invisibility

throw off-balance.benefits: force a creature to take a 5-foot step and become flat-footed under certain conditions

trap training.benefits: gain the learn ranger trap feat

trick shot.benefits: perform the feint combat maneuver with a ranged weapon

wall jumper.benefits: run up a vertical surface at a cost of 20 feet of movement per 5 feet ascended

wall mastery.benefits: become an expert at leaping from surface to surface and perching from walls and corners

improved ki pool.benefits:
rogue: use int as wis to determine number of ki points in ki pool, plus 1/2 rogue level. Flanking bonuses gained in combat increase by +1 as long as you have at least one point in ki pool. 
ninja: increase flanking bonus as above but no other benefits.

rogues finesse.benefits: may use dex instead of str on attack rolls with a light or one-handed weapon that you are proficient with and treat the selected weapon as a one-handed piercing weapon for all feats and class abilities that require such a weapon.

crippling missile.benefits: hinder opponents combat ability using combat maneuvers with thrown weapons.

deadly tricks.benefits: gain greater dirty trick and quick dirty trick as bonus feats.

fearsome tattoos.benefits: reveal your tattoos to get a +2 bonus to intimidate checks.

jaunters filch.prerequisites: rogue 6, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains
jaunters filch.benefits: as a move action, the rogue can expend a mote of movement to teleport one unattended object within 25 ft. + 5 ft. /2 rogue class levels to any other location within the same range, including into the rogues hands.

jaunters hop.prerequisites: rogue 2, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains
jaunters hop.benefits: each day, the rogue gains a pool of supernatural motes of movement equal to three plus her rogue class level.

jaunters mastery.prerequisites: rogue 10, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains
jaunters mastery.benefits: the rogue may spend multiple moments of chance per round if desired.

jaunters prison.prerequisites: rogue 4, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains
jaunters prison.benefits: as a move action, the rogue can expend a mote of movement to create an extradimensional prison for one day per rogue class level where the rogue can store a helpless or willing creature (without gear) touched in stasis.

jaunters rein.prerequisites: rogue 8, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains
jaunters rein.benefits: as an immediate action, the rogue can expend a mote of movement to cast dimensional anchor as a spell-like ability.

jaunters slice.prerequisites: rogue 4, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains
jaunters slice.benefits: as a swift action, you can expend a mote of movement to teleport some part of a creature's body into the closest empty square chosen by the jaunter.

jaunters strike.prerequisites: rogue 6, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains
jaunters strike.benefits: as a move action, you can expend a mote of movement to momentarily whisk yourself off to another location within 100 ft. + 10 ft. /rogue class level.

jaunters wink.prerequisites: rogue 8, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains
jaunters wink.benefits: as a move action, you can expend a mote of movement to dimension door as a spell-like ability.

read tells.benefits: once per day, add +10 to a single sense motive skill check.

samurai trained.benefits: gain the katana exotic weapon proficiency.

tricky combatant.benefits: use rogue level as bab for dirty tricks; vicious opportunists also receive improved dirty trick as a bonus feat.

wasps sting.benefits: attacks with a piercing weapon ignore damage reduction equal to intelligence modifier.

against the wall (ex).benefits: you are considered to be flanking any opponent adjacent to a stone wall (whether the stone is worked or unworked).

aligned disguise (sp).benefits: when you use the disguise self spell-like ability, you can also alter your alignment aura to deceive spells that discern alignment (such as detect evil) for the duration of the disguise self effect.

another day.benefits: take a 5-foot-step to avoid being reduced to 0 or fewer hit points

blinding strike.benefits: you gain blinding critical as a bonus feat, even if you dont meet the prerequisites.

confounding blades*.benefits: prevent attacks of opportunity when you do damage with a sneak attack

crippling strike*.benefits: sneak attacks also deal 2 points of strength damage

dance of disorienting shadows (ex).benefits: you can attempt a perform (dance) check in place of a combat maneuver check when attempting a reposition combat maneuver.

deadly cocktail.benefits: apply two doses of poison to a weapon

deadly sneak*.benefits: treat all 1s and 2s on sneak attack damage dice as 3s

defensive roll.benefits: make a reflex save to take half damage from a blow

dispelling attack*.benefits: cast dispel magic on targets damaged by sneak attack

entanglement of blades*.benefits: targets damaged by sneak attack may not make 5-foot-steps

familiar.prerequisites: advanced talents, major magic, minor magic

fast tumble.benefits: improve your skill at avoiding attacks of opportunity

founders blessing (su).benefits: once per day, choose a skill in which you have no ranks. After 10 minutes, gain a luck bonus equal to your rogue level with that skill, and can attempt checks with that skill as if she were trained in its use. The effects of founders blessing last for 8 hours.

frugal trapsmith.benefits: pay 75% of the cost when building a trap

getaway master.benefits: gain a +10 bonus on drive checks

glib facade (sp).benefits: 1/day, you can use glibness as a spell-like ability, using your rogue level as the spells cl.

hamstring strike*.benefits: when you hit an opponent with a sneak attack, you may forgo dealing sneak attack damage to try to hamstring your opponent.

hard minded (ex).benefits: you are hard to fool with mind-affecting effects

harrow strike (ex).benefits: 1/day when making a sneak attack, draw a random harrow card. If attack hits, instead of dealing sneak attack damage deal ability damage equal to the number of sneak attack dice.

hide in plain sight.benefits: hide while being observed in your favored terrain

hunters surprise.benefits: add sneak attack damage to all attacks made against one target

improved shadows chill* (su).prerequisites: cold resistance racial trait, shadows chill
improved shadows chill* (su).benefits: sneak attack damage you deal is cold damage

knock-out blow.benefits: knock an opponent out instead of dealing sneak attack damage

improved evasion.benefits: make a reflex save to take no damage from area attacks

master of disguise.benefits: 1/day gain +10 bonus on a disguise check

master tricks.benefits: select a ninja trick from the list of master tricks in place of a rogue talent

opportunist.benefits: make an attack of opportunity when a target is damaged in melee

petrifying strike* (su).benefits: whenever you damage a creature with a sneak attack, you also deal 2 points of dexterity damage to that creature as its body petrifies

redirect attack.benefits: redirect an attack that hits you to another target

reflexive shadow shield (su).benefits: 1/day as an immediate action, gain cold resistance or electricity resistance equal to half the rogues level for 1 round

resonating rumbles* (su).benefits: whenever you make a successful sneak attack against a creature with tremorsense, you can subtract 3 dice from the sneak attack damage to prevent the target from using tremorsense for a number of rounds equal to half your rogue level

see in darkness (su).benefits: you gain the see in darkness ability

shrinewalk (sp).benefits: a rogue with shrinewalk can create her shrine and use word of recall to return to it

skill mastery.benefits: take 10 at any time on certain skills

slippery mind.benefits: make an extra saving throw against enchantments

stealthy sniper.benefits: take a reduced penalty to stealth when sniping

thoughtful reexamining.benefits: reroll a knowledge, sense motive, or perception check

unlock ki (ex).benefits: increase the number of ki points you gain from the ki pool rogue talent and gain skill unlocks for one skill of your choice as appropriate for the number of ranks in that skill

unwitting ally.benefits: make an opponent act as a flanking partner

weapon snatcher.benefits: use sleight of hand to disarm an opponent

center of combat.benefits: gain a +1 dodge bonus to ac for every adjacent opponent beyond the first.

combat snatcher.benefits: use sleight of hand bonus instead of cmb when performing a steal combat maneuver.

concussive strike.benefits: deal 1 point of damage to the targets intelligence, wisdom, and charisma in conjunction with sneak attack.

devastating sneak.prerequisites: powerful sneak, deadly sneak, advanced rogue talents
devastating sneak.benefits: treat all 1s, 2s and 3s on the sneak attack damage dice as 4s when using the powerful sneak rogue talent.

eviscerating strike.benefits: use sneak attacks to disembowel an enemy.

fascinate.prerequisites: major artistic talent, advanced rogue talents
fascinate.benefits: use the perform skill to cause one or more creatures to become fascinated.

group feint.benefits: make a separate feint check against every threatened enemy.

improved familiar.prerequisites: advanced rogue talents, familiar, major magic, minor magic

leg strike.benefits: halve an enemys movement speed for 1d4 rounds with sneak attack damage.

magebane attack.benefits: force an enemy to make concentration checks to cast spells the round after a successful sneak attack.

magical traps.benefits: disarm magical traps; gain a bonus to finding and disarming traps.

master sniper.benefits: double the sniping penalty to a stealth check to make a full attack and hide afterward.

mutagen.benefits: prepare a mutagen as the alchemist class feature.

opportunistic archer.benefits: flank opponents threatened by two allies with ranged attacks.

poison use.benefits: no longer risk poisoning when applying poison to a weapon.

quick poison.benefits: apply poison to a weapon as a swift action.

quiet death.benefits: make a stealth check to prevent others from identifying you as the assailant when you kill, knock unconscious, or stun a creature during a surprise round.

scroll rogue.benefits: gains a +4 bonus to spellcraft and use magic device checks with scrolls.

swift kick.benefits: as a swift action, spend a guile point to give a swift kick to an adjacent target.

tactical master.benefits: use assault leader an additional 1 time per day for every 5 rogue levels she possesses.

trap master (ex or su).benefits: gain bonuses and abilities related to trap creation.

wand rogue.benefits: activate a wand with a move action.

jaunters juxtaposition.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 10, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters labyrinth.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 16, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters ostracism.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 18, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters rally.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 14, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters removal.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 14, jaunters hop, jaunters slice, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters retreat.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 12, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters seeking.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 10, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters stride.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 10, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters terminus.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 20, jaunters hop, 4 other jaunters rogue talents, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters tomb.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 18, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters void.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 16, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

jaunters wake.prerequisites: advanced talents, rogue 12, jaunters hop, worship deity with trickery and travel (sub)domains

reckless charge.benefits: you can choose to gain an additional +2 bonus to attack and damage when making a charge attack

vengeful.benefits: gain a +2 morale bonus to attack and damage rolls made against an opponent who has physically injured you
